title: Prohibits the denial of employment of an MRI technologist solely based on their lack of licensure and/or certification in x-ray or radiography
summary: Prohibits the denial of employment of an MRI technologist, as an MRI technologist, solely based on their lack of licensure and/or certification in x-ray or radiography.

memo:
BILL NUMBER:S2059

TITLE OF BILL:

An act
to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the denial of
employment of an MRI technologist solely based on their lack of
licensure and/or certification in x-ray or radiography

PURPOSE:

This bill would define "magnetic resonance imaging technologist" and
makes it unlawful to deny employment to any magnetic resonance
imaging (MRI) technologist certified by a nationally recognized
organization, as a magnetic imaging technologist, solely on the basis
that he or she lacks licensure and/or certification in x-ray or
radiography.

SUMMARY OF PROVISIONS:

Section 1 of this bill provides a definition for "magnetic resonance
imaging technologist".

Section 2 of this bill makes it unlawful to deny employment to any
magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) technologist certified by a
nationally recognized organization, as a magnetic imaging
technologist, solely on the basis that he or she lacks licensure
and/or certification in x-ray or radiography.

Section 3 of this bill provides for an immediate effective date.

JUSTIFICATION:
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) is a technology used by physicians
and hospitals that uses magnetic signals, rather than X-rays to
create images of the human body. Unlike x-rays, MRI technologists do
not use ionizing radiation, however, this distinction is often not
clear to employers when seeking to hire magnetic resonance imaging
technologists, often resulting in those certified by nationally
recognized organizations in the field to be denied employment because
they lack licensure and/or certification in x-ray or radiology. This
in effect, has created a shortage of MRI technologists in many areas,
and a lack of competition in the marketplace providing these services.

EFFECTIVE DATE:
Immediately.
